comments.body: Maybe worth having a look if the work done by @SamirTalwar in #3871 can be ported here, replacing `AutoCloseable` with the safer `Resource`/`ResourceOwner` monadic construct.

Agreed regarding the need to have a consistent resource management approach across our code base. We may want to consider adopting one of the existing automatic resource management libraries such as https://github.com/tmoschou/arm4s
